sense.name: farm
sense.commentary: factory farm, agribusiness - a large-scale farming enterprise
sense.examples: Agriculture is very important for their economy.

sense.name: farming
sense.commentary: AGRICULTURE[+event] farming, husbandry - the practice of cultivating the land or raising stock; a large-scale farming enterprise
sense.examples: He's moved down south and gotten himself into agriculture. Agriculture occupies most of his time these days.

sense.name: farmers
sense.commentary: the class of people engaged in growing food
sense.examples: The polls show that agriculture is unhappy with the changes we've made.

sense.name: DoA
sense.commentary: Department of Agriculture, Agriculture Department, Agriculture, USDA - the federal department that administers programs that provide services to farmers (including research and soil conservation and efforts to stabilize the farming economy)
